blog.name: fanfiction-haven
blog.title: Fanfictions- Harry Potter
blog.description: Messages are open, feel free to write!

body:
Drarry & summer

Harry loves the beach, but Draco doesn’t really. First thing, his skin is really sensitive, so he can get a sunburn easily. Not even spells can make the pain go away. Second thing, beaches are crowded with loud muggles and even louder wizards/witches. His only reason for him to go to the beach is his boyfriend, Harry Potter.(and swimming. Swimming is great, too)

Harry barely knew how to swim, but since he is dating with Draco, who is an excellent swimmer, he could improve a little bit. In his old life, with the Dursleys, he never ever dreamt of swimming; the most he could want is regular food.

Deciding where to go is one of the hardest question to them. Harry wants to go on a popular sea, not only because he loves the way the salt sticks to Draco’s skin - all the way down to his spine too, wich makes him look like a tiny salt-dragon - but because these seaside adventures always fill his heart with pure happiness. The warm feeling on his brownish skin, the birds flying far above, and the fish swimming in the crystalclear water are like drugs to him.

And the sunsets… He watched a lot of them with Draco. The sky’s black, plain canvas covered with such amazing colours… All those red, orange, yellow and pink clouds really make him mesmermized.

Draco wants something different. A calm, almost abadoned lake, far from everybody else. Where they can summon patronuses and practice magic. A quiet place where Harry opens up to him every night; sometimes crying or searching for worlds… Telling him how much he’s sorry for the fallen… Crying because he knows that Teddy Lupin, that poor child has to live without his parents… Or his godfather, or his parents… But Draco can make him feel better. That’s it. Draco wants Harry over anything else, feeling his personal love, seeing his weaknesses and helping him to stand up. Harry and Draco are meant to be.

summary: hey antonin... i heard alecto might not be as straight as she seems... apparently she has a crush on remus lupin, but he's...
question: hey antonin... i heard alecto might not be as straight as she seems... apparently she has a crush on remus lupin, but he's taken, so she might be looking for a rebound...? (pls let antonin and alecto/sirius have a very awkward encounter)
answer:
Antonin: I don’t want to be anyone’s fucking rebound…

Antonin: But this is an interesting development.

Painted this during a break in the game. I had to fight Boggart Voldemort at least 10 times and I rage quit for a while. My Hufflepuff wife put me back on track. 

Please don’t repost or crop! Only reblog. Likes are nice, too! :)

summary: A Price to Pay - Hi Pot And News (MaidenThailand) - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
title: A Price to Pay - Hi Pot And News (MaidenThailand) - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Summary: It’s not all fun and games being a wealthy orphan. I mean, yeah, Harry didn’t have to deal with the Dursleys any longer, and lots of pocket money was great, but if someone could hold his hand while a monster was apparently on the loose? That’d be even better.

Rating: Teen And Up Audiences

Archive Warning: No Archive Warnings Apply

Fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling

Characters: Harry Potter, Morag MacDougal, Justin Finch-Fletchley, Dean Thomas, The Weasleys, Hogwarts Staff, Hogwarts Students, OCs

Additional Tags: Despite all the canon atrocity going on, I will be shoving SO much levity that I will force it to be funny, Not as dark as the title would lead you to think

Language: English

Words: 6041

Chapter: 1/?

FFN LINK

Yayyyy! First chapter up! Now I gotta work on the others …

summary:
Me: My patronus is so pathetic.
My Mum: What is it?
Me, panicking: I don't have one.
My Mum: Oh, okay.
My Sister: *laughs*
Me:...
body:
Me: My patronus is so pathetic.

My Mum: What is it?

Me, panicking: I don’t have one.

My Mum: Oh, okay.

My Sister: *laughs*

Me: I… I can’t believe she bought that.

My Mum: Oh, okay.

Me: I… I can’t believe she bought that.

summary:
There's a grief that can't be spoken
There's a pain goes on and on
Empty chairs at empty tables
Now my friends are dead and...
caption:
There’s a grief that can’t be spoken
There’s a pain goes on and on
Empty chairs at empty tables
Now my friends are dead and gone

Here they talked of revolution
Here it was they lit the flame
Here they sang about tomorrow
And tomorrow never came

From the table in the corner
They could see a world reborn
And they rose with voices ringing
And I can hear them now
The very words that they had sung
Became their last communion
On this lonely barricade at dawn

Oh my friends, my friends forgive me
That I live and you are gone
There’s a grief that can’t be spoken
There’s a pain goes on and on

Phantom faces at the windows
Phantom shadows on the floor
Empty chairs at empty tables
Where my friends will meet no more

Oh my friends, my friends, don’t ask me
What your sacrifice was for
Empty chairs at empty tables
Where my friends will sing no more

(Art by Atalienart)

blog.name: harrypotterfan1992
blog.title: “I'm hoping to do some good in the world!”

body:
Marauder ‘excuses’.

“They were just harmless teenagers joking around.”

Sexual assault and nearly killing a fellow student doesn’t sound like a joke to me.

“They were kids, they didn’t know any better.”

I don’t know about you but I was very self aware at 13, let alone anything above that. They knew what they were doing.

“Snape held on to his grudges, he should have let them go.”

I hung out with kids from abused homes who didn’t feel they belonged because everyone deserves a friend and they grew up to be happier people which yes I’d like to think is partially because I was there for them. Then there was me who, despite hanging out with those kids, never really had anyone asking me how I was doing and was constantly bullied and I certainly do hold grudges for that. Should I excuse someone for ruining my childhood? No thank you.

“They matured, they changed, Snape didn’t.”

Firstly, we don’t know at all if any of them really changed except maybe Lupin. And Snape certainly did change, he became bitter BECAUSE of the way he was treated at home AND because of the marauders. They took a great lead in making him who he was.

“He took it out on Harry, it’s unfair.”

Perhaps it’s a little petty, but keep in mind that he did need to save the boy’s ass countless of times all the while Harry acted like an arrogant kid (because he just thought Snape was a mean teacher) and looked exactly like James. Don’t tell me you would look at the photocopy of the person you hate most and say 'gee they must be a wonderful person.’ Whenever I see someone who looks like my sexual abuser I try to avoid them because I know they didn’t do it, but I can’t help but think of it when I see them. So yes, it’s justifiable that he felt bitter around Harry for looking like James.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

reblog.comment:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

summary: Alecto, did you get rid of your erection? XD

answer: Alecto: It went down by itself thank GOD but when I woke up this morning the disgusting thing was back and it still hasn’t gone away!

summary: The days of War have risen, an all consuming tidal wave that swallows each and every person standing near. There’s no longer any...
caption:
The days of War have risen, an all consuming tidal wave that swallows each and every person standing near. There’s no longer any pretence that this will go away quietly. With the Hogwarts students safe, sequestered away in that great castle, the Wizarding World feels the tension rippling, a blistering ache from which two organisations spring to life:

The Order of the Phoenix, founded by Albus Dumbledore in the early 1970s, keeping a watchful eye on the growth of the army of the man known as Lord Voldemort. It’s members were few in the beginning, only the most trusted being admitted entrance (the nameless few being Alastor Moody, Aberforth Dumbledore, Kingsley Shacklebolt, and Minerva McGonagall,) but the days are rolling on with no end in sight and so membership has grown, recruiting recent alumni and esteemed members of Wizarding society, alike.

The Death Eaters, formerly known as the Knights of Walpurgis, founded by Lord Voldemort. Masked men who strike with the intention to purify the Wizarding World, seeming to take stock in the same ideals as that of Gellert Grindelwald, the wizard known for the ‘Wizards first’ rhetoric and his strive to gain the much sought after and doubted Deathly Hallows. It is unknown how successful Lord Voldemort has been, as of yet, but recent outbursts of anti-muggleborn violence have left many members of society feeling on edge.

For now, there seems to be a stalemate, an endless amount of days with the landscape of war hanging over their heads - what will the future bring? Will this stalemate ever end? What will come of the mysterious Order of the Phoenix? What will come of the Death Eaters? What will come of those keeping their heads down, keeping out of the war, playing as important a role as anyone?

Welcome to War Waged, a semi-canon/canon divergent Marauders Era roleplay beginning in October 1978, diving into the ever changing political landscape of the war, with characters on each side struggling through life. A known blood purist, Alexander Travers, has just been elected to the British seat at the International Confederation of Wizards, and the Minister has said nothing about the booting of Albus Dumbledore from the Wizengamot. What does the future hold? Nobody knows.

summary: Lay off on the house points speech okay
body:
Lay off on the house points speech okay

MC: *walks in to common room*

House prefect: “have you earned any more points fo-“

MC: “say one more word and I swear I will ram my wand SO far down your throat you’ll have to cast aquamenti to pee!”

summary: Alecto, you should tell Remus that you’re Sirius. It might make your test last a bit longer, but then you won’t have to deal...
question: Alecto, you should tell Remus that you’re Sirius. It might make your test last a bit longer, but then you won’t have to deal with your period. Plus, Sirius will have to deal with it, which’ll make it 20x better.
answer: Alecto: I am not staying in this disgusting male body for any longer than I need to. I feel extremely gross.
